title: Rooms 2: The Unsolvable Puzzle (BFG Ed) [Wendy99] ~ Maraya21
description:
Rooms 2: The Unsolvable Puzzle (BFG Edition) (Puzzle,Arcade,Platform) ~ Maraya21
 
https://s6.postimg.org/99d62jpg1/Rooms_2_The_Unsolvable_Puzzle.jpg

Rooms 2: The Unsolvable Puzzle is a unique puzzle game inspired by sliding puzzle and platformer games. In a twisted mansion made of rooms that slide like puzzle pieces, you must find a way to the escape by moving rooms and using items. As you explore the mansion, various gadgets make the puzzles more tricky and challenging.In this fairy-tale world full of magical objects and spooky stories, you take a role of an innocent little girl, Anne, who was accidentally trapped in the mansion. As the story unfolds, you'll be challenged to solve a series of diabolical puzzles while the dark legend of the twisted mansion is revealed.

Features:
- Unique and proven puzzle mechanic
- Four beautifully crafted mansion themes
- Complete storyline with two possible endings

System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
CPU: 1.8 GHz
RAM: 2048 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 425 MB
